author: anmenaga
body:
Adding PowerShell/docs/cmdlet-example/README.md that describes how to create a .net core cmdlet with Visual Studio.

Fix #3081 
Fix #4809

comments.author: anmenaga
SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @anmenaga updated your description, I believe this should also address https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/4809

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
Please add this file to the `docsToTest` list in [`markdown.tests.ps1`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/test/common/markdown/markdown.tests.ps1#L74), so that the test can validate the markdown syntax of this file.

The `.spelling` file needs to be updated. Please see the failure in Travis-CI build.

comments.author: anmenaga
comments.body:
Added this doc to markdown.tests.ps1; tests pass.
.spelling file updated.

comments.author: anmenaga
comments.body:
@SteveL-MSFT @daxian-dbw PR updated, please review again. Thanks.
https://github.com/anmenaga/PowerShell/blob/CmdletExample/docs/cmdlet-example/visual-studio-simple-example.md

title: Example of how to create a .net core cmdlet with Visual Studio
